sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from '../services/user.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Firma } from '../models/firma'; import Dekorater from '../models/dekorater'; @Component({ selector: 'app-firme', templateUrl: './firme.component.html', styleUrls: ['./firme.component.css'] }) export class FirmeComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private servis:UserService,private ruter:Router){} ngOnInit(): void { this.servis.dohvatiFirme().subscribe( f=>{ this.firme=f } ) this.servis.dohvatiDekoratere().subscribe( d=>{ this.dekorateri=d } ) } menuVisible = false; // Kontrola vidljivosti padajućeg menija firme:Firma[]=[] dekorateri:Dekorater[]=[] selectedSortOption:string='' toggleMenu() { this.menuVisible = !this.menuVisible; // Prebacuje vidljivost menija } sortirajRastuce() { this.firme.sort((a, b) => a.naziv.localeCompare(b.naziv)); } sortirajOpadajuce() { this.firme.sort((a, b) => b.naziv.localeCompare(a.naziv)); } sortiraj(){} } Početna Stranica <
